name: test_store_with_non_hex_characters_in_hash

XFAIL Bug reported: https://github.com/waku-org/go-waku/issues/1109

AssertionError: Expected '# is not a hexadecimal character' error, got Error: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:21728/store/v3/messages?hashes=%23%23%23%20INVALID%20HASH%20%23%23%23&pageSize=50&ascending=true with response: b'{"status_code":400,"status_desc":"illegal base64 data at input byte 0"}'
